description:
I decided to try Samsung's Self-Repair program on my broken Galaxy S21, and the experience was full of surprises. What started as a simple screen replacement turned into a deep dive into Samsung's repair policies and by the end, I uncovered some shocking truths about the real cost and complexity of DIY phone repairs.

Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.com/austinevans
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@austintechtips
Instagram: https://instagram.com/austinnotduncan
Twitter: https://twitter.com/austinnotduncan
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@austinnotduncan

Chapter Titles:
0:00 Samsung Self Repair
2:16 Parts
3:57 Disassembly
9:45 Reassembly
12:20 Worth It?
title: The TRUTH about Samsung "Self Repair"
